Text:
Fantastic thriller with our beloved pretty Nicole Kidman.
Of course we respect each other's opinions, but to hell with all the idiots who rated down on imdb this movie. They all need a psychiatrist.
Yeah, This is a good one. Sort of reminds me of "The Forgotten" (2004) http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0356618/?ref_=sr_1 Wish that would get released on Blu-ray.
